pkgmetadata.longdescription: # aws-ecs-exec[![pypi-version]][pypi]A cli tool to conveniently execute commands in AWS ECS Tasks.## Requirements- Python 3.10+- AWS CLIThe tool assumes that the `aws` command is installed on your path.## InstallationInstall using `pip````shpip install aws-ecs-exec```## UsageQuickstart:```sh$ ecs-exec```For help:```sh$ ecs-exec --help```## Known issues- This has been developed and only tested on MacOS.- No pagination is used with boto3 calls, so there will likely be errors if page limits are exceeded.- Does not support tasks with multiple containers.[pypi-version]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/aws-ecs-exec.svg[pypi]: https://pypi.org/project/aws-ecs-exec/
